taker module¶

class taker.CoinJoinTX(msgchan, wallet, db, cj_amount, orders, input_utxos, my_cj_addr, my_change_addr, total_txfee, finishcallback, choose_orders_recover, auth_addr=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Encapsulation of a single Coinjoin transaction for a taker.

class TimeoutThread(cjtx)[source]¶

Bases: threading.Thread

run()[source]¶
CoinJoinTX.add_signature(nick, sigb64)[source]¶

Called repeatedly to add signatures to the transaction template. Once all signatures have been filled in, runs finishcallback (which will sign and push the transaction.)

CoinJoinTX.auth_counterparty(nick, btc_sig, cj_pub)[source]¶

Validate the counterpartys claim to own the btc address/pubkey that will be used for coinjoining with an ecdsa verification.

CoinJoinTX.coinjoin_address()[source]¶
CoinJoinTX.push(txd)[source]¶

Push the transaction txd to the network using the existing BlockchainInterface instance.

CoinJoinTX.recover_from_nonrespondants()[source]¶

if there is no choose_orders_recover then end and call finishcallback so the caller can handle it in their own way, notable for sweeping where simply replacing the makers wont work.

CoinJoinTX.recv_txio(nick, utxo_list, cj_pub, change_addr)[source]¶

Called repeatedly to gather the transaction inputs from the makers. Once all have been gathered, constructs the transaction to be signed and sends it to the makers. utxo_list is our utxos, cj_pub is the pubkey for our coinjoin output address, and change_addr is our change address.

CoinJoinTX.self_sign()[source]¶

Sign the current version of the transaction.

CoinJoinTX.self_sign_and_push()[source]¶
CoinJoinTX.sign_tx(tx, i, priv)[source]¶
CoinJoinTX.start_encryption(nick, maker_pk)[source]¶

Instantiates a nacl crypto_box object via ECDH. Creates Bitcoin signature of our nacl pubkey and sends this sig with bitcoin pubkey and nacl pubkey in !auth message.

class taker.CoinJoinerPeer(msgchan)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class of all Taker and Maker and hybrids.

get_crypto_box_from_nick(nick)[source]¶
on_set_topic(newtopic)[source]¶

Used for broadcasting important messages to all Joinmarket entities.

class taker.OrderbookWatch(msgchan)[source]¶

Bases: taker.CoinJoinerPeer

A CoinJoiner peer that is used only for viewing the market, not taking part in transactions. Note however that Taker inherits from this class to use its database of orders.

class taker.Taker(msgchan)[source]¶

Bases: taker.OrderbookWatch

get_crypto_box_from_nick(nick)[source]¶

Return the nacl crypto Box encapsulating encrypted messaging with the counterparty ‘nick’.

on_error()[source]¶
on_ioauth(nick, utxo_list, cj_pub, change_addr, btc_sig)[source]¶

On reception of an !ioauth message from a maker, process its input utxos, first verify its btc signature btc_sig of its nacl pubkey with btc pubkey cj_pub .

on_pubkey(nick, maker_pubkey)[source]¶

On reception of !pubkey message from a maker, initiate encrypted messaging with it.

on_sig(nick, sig)[source]¶
